articles.title: 2-Minute Walk After Eating Can Help Control Blood Sugar - Health.com
articles.description: Going for a short, two-minute walk after a meal can help reduce blood sugar levels, new research shows.
articles.content:
Going for a walk after a meal can help reduce blood sugar levels, even if it's just for a few short minutes, new research shows.
